PageWidgetPortable.Title: Alternativos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_PRODUTOALTERNATIVOPRODUTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PRODUTOPAI IN (SELECT PRODUTOPAI FROM PD_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4468_at6757_hs3e4bf5c4.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Classificação NVE>Atributos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_TR_NVEATRIBUTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (
SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PD_PRODUTOS INNER JOIN TR_TIPIS ON (TR_TIPIS.HANDLE = PD_PRODUTOS.CLASSIFICACAOTIPI) INNER JOIN TR_NVEATRIBUTO B ON (B.NCM = TR_TIPIS.HANDLE) WHERE PD_PRODUTOS.HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS) AND PD_PRODUTOS.TRIBUTACAO = 1
UNION
SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PD_PRODUTOS INNER JOIN PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS ON (PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS.HANDLE = PD_PRODUTOS.FAMILIA) INNER JOIN TR_TIPIS ON (TR_TIPIS.HANDLE = PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS.CLASSIFICACAOTIPI) INNER JOIN TR_NVEATRIBUTO B ON (B.NCM = TR_TIPIS.HANDLE) WHERE PD_PRODUTOS.HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS) AND PD_PRODUTOS.TRIBUTACAO = 2
)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t5091_at7438_hsc5a59b6a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Imagens
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_GN_IMAGENS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.TABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'PD_PRODUTOS') AND A.HANDLEORIGEM = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2464_at3568_hs20601112.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Movimentos de bloqueio
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_MOVIMENTACAOHISTORICO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.TIPOMOVIMENTACAO IN(SELECT HANDLE FROM PD_CODIGOSMOVIMENTACAO WHERE ALMOXBLOQ > 1) AND (A.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1971_at5283_hse16d7f81.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Movimentos trânsito filiais
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_MOVIMENTACAOHISTORICO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.TIPOMOVIMENTACAO IN(SELECT HANDLE FROM PD_CODIGOSMOVIMENTACAO WHERE ALMOXTRANFILIAL > 1) AND (A.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1971_at7346_hs4c5f120.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordens de compra
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_ORDENSCOMPRA.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT ORDEMCOMPRA FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS WHERE PRODUTO = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1529_at2397_hsc042282a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Recebimentos fiscais
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CM_ITENS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.DOCUMENTO IN(SELECT B.HANDLE FROM FN_DOCUMENTOS B WHERE B.TIPOREGISTRO=3 AND B.DOCUMENTOORIGEM IS NOT NULL)) AND (A.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1756_at2607_hs4be54d81.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Tipos de inspeção>Ativos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_QL_TIPOINSPECAOPRODUTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PRODUTO = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS) AND A.ROTEIROINSPECAO IN (SELECT ROTEIROINSPECAO FROM PD_PRODUTOS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS)) AND A.FORNECEDOR IS NULL AND A.ATIVO = 'S' AND A.FORNECEDOR IS NULL AND A.REQUISICAO IS NULL AND A.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM IS NULL AND A.ROTEIRO IS NULL AND (A.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4883_at7314_hs6bf2ea0c.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Tipos de inspeção>Inativos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_QL_TIPOINSPECAOPRODUTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.PRODUTO = @RASTRO(PD_PRODUTOS) AND A.FORNECEDOR IS NULL AND A.ATIVO = 'N' AND A.FORNECEDOR IS NULL AND A.REQUISICAO IS NULL AND A.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM IS NULL AND A.ROTEIRO IS NULL AND (A.PRODUTO = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4883_at7315_hs3f467f62.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
